name: Placentia
shortDescription: Charming suburban city known for its tree-lined streets, historic downtown, and family-friendly environment.
fullDescription: Placentia is a welcoming community in Orange County that offers a small-town feel with convenient access to larger urban centers. Known for its well-maintained parks, quality schools, and a vibrant historic district featuring shops and restaurants, Placentia is popular with families and professionals seeking a balanced lifestyle. Its location near major freeways makes commuting to neighboring cities easy.
heroImageAlt: Tree-lined street in Placentia with suburban homes

neighborhoods.name: Anaheim
neighborhoods.description: Major Orange County city known for entertainment, sports, and diverse neighborhoods.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: City boulevard scene representative of Anaheim

neighborhoods.name: Brea
neighborhoods.description: Suburban city with shopping, dining, and well-rated schools north of Placentia.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Suburban neighborhood street representative of Brea

neighborhoods.name: Yorba Linda
neighborhoods.description: Upscale residential community with parks, trails, and spacious homes east of Placentia.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Green hills and suburban homes representative of Yorba Linda

highlights.title: Historic Downtown Placentia
highlights.description: Vibrant area with boutique shops, dining, and community events.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Shops and streets in Historic Downtown Placentia

highlights.title: Craig Regional Park
highlights.description: Large park featuring playgrounds, picnic areas, and sports facilities.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Playground and greenery at Craig Regional Park

highlights.title: Placentia Library District
highlights.description: Modern library with community programs and events.

highlights.title: Community Events
highlights.description: Popular events include summer concerts, farmers markets, and seasonal festivals.

faqs.question: What is Placentia known for?
faqs.answer: Placentia is known for its historic downtown, family-friendly neighborhoods, and community events.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Placentia?
faqs.answer: Placentia is served by the Placentia-Yorba Linda Unified School District, offering highly rated schools.

faqs.question: What parks are available in Placentia?
faqs.answer: Craig Regional Park and several community parks provide recreational options for residents.

faqs.question: How is the commute from Placentia?
faqs.answer: The city has easy access to the 57 and 91 freeways, with typical commutes of 30-45 minutes to nearby job centers.
